message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for us both. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for you to consider. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for all parties involved.
